data.title: Saif Ali Khan wife: Who is Sacred Games star married to? Who is Kareena Kapoor?
data.meta_description: SAIF ALI KHAN returned to Netflix series Sacred Games in season 2 and fans around the world are keen to know more about the actor’s home life. In particular, who Saif Ali Khan’s wife Kareen Kapoor is.
data.text:
Netflix tease Mumbai crime drama Sacred Games 2

Sacred Games’ leading man Saif Ali Khan returned to the Netflix series in August for the second season of the hit Indian drama. Khan’s become a household name around the world thanks to appearing in every episode of Sacred Games and it turns out the glitz and glam of showbiz doesn’t stop with him in his family. Khan’s wife Kareena Kapoor is also a successful actor and here’s everything Sacred Games fans need to know about her.

Who is Sacred Games star Saif Ali Khan married to?

Saif Ali Khan, 49, may play the no-nonsense detective Sartaj Singh in Sacred Games but away from the Netflix series he’s much more of a family man.

Khan married 38-year-old Bollywood actress Kareena Kapoor in 2012.

Together, they’ve formed one of Bollywood’s most famous power couples.

READ MORE: Sacred Games: How does the TV show differ from the novel?

Khan and Kapoor have a son together called Taimur and often share adorable family photos on their respective Instagram pages.

While Khan has achieved global success with Sacred Games, his wife has enjoyed similar success with a number of her films and TV series in India.

Kapoor has won over a dozen major film awards for her on-screen performance as well as over 30 nominations.

Her notable acting credits include roles in the widely successful comedy 3 Idiots, Indian romcom Bodyguard and starred opposite her husband in 2006 award-winner Omkara.

READ MORE: Sacred Games season 3 confirmed? Showrunner teases return

Invalid email

Speaking about his wife’s reaction to Sacred Games in conversation with the Hindustan Times, Khan revealed Kapoor was “taken aback” by the show.

Khan also added his wife was “surprised by how good it was.”

However, there’s one scene in particular which shocked Kapoor when she first watched Sacred Games.

“She was quite taken aback by Kukoo’s (played by Kubbra Sait) willy,” he told the publication.

READ MORE: Sacred Games season 2 cast: Who is in the cast of Sacred Games?

Away from their on-screen careers, Khan and Kapoor are no strangers to making public appearances together.

With such a public interest in their marriage in India, Khan and Kapoor often hit the red carpet.

During the time of Sacred Games season two’s release, the pair and their son were in London.

Khan also celebrated a birthday recently with his wife sharing a sweet snap of their family while in the UK capital.

The Sacred Games star is filming his upcoming blockbuster Jawani Janeman while in London.

Sacred Games season 2 is available to stream on Netflix now.
